headline: Edison International, Southern California Edison Declare Dividends
summary: ROSEMEAD, Calif., September 22, 2025--The board of directors of Edison International (NYSE: EIX) today declared a quarterly common stock dividend of $0.8275 per share, payable on Oct. 31, 2025, to shareholders of record on Oct. 7, 2025.

headline: Edison International’s (EIX) Consistent Payouts Make it a Key Choice in Safest High Dividend Stocks
summary: Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is included among the 10 Safest High Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. Edison International (NYSE:EIX) is a utility holding company that delivers clean and dependable energy and related services through its subsidiaries. It serves as the parent company of Southern California Edison Company (SCE) and Trio. Edison International (NYSE:EIX) reported strong earnings […]
